parsed.justification: As a beginner student with limited time and just a laptop, this response gives me specific, small-scale experiments I can try on Colab in a day or two without needing advanced skills upfront, reducing my confusion about starting AI research. It respects my constraints by focusing on free tools and short runs but assumes some basic Python comfort, which might need quick resource skimming.
